short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ezto auth Browser extension to manage Intelligent Web Apps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ezto auth Browser Plugin protects your passwords and securely logs you into all your business and personal apps.

With the ezto auth Browser Plugin you can:

*Automatically sign in to your business and personal apps with just one click
*Add your own apps into ezto auth SSO Dashboard
*Easily access your ezto auth dashboard apps and tabs
*Seamlessly and securely switch between multiple Okta accounts
*Bring Legacy Apps that doesnt fit to OIDC and SAML protocol

You need an ezto auth account to use the ezto auth Browser Plugin. If you cannot access your ezto auth account via ezto auth Browser Plugin, please contact your admin.
